Text: Kamen Rider Battle: Ganbaride (仮面ライダーバトル ガンバライド , Kamen Raidā Batoru Ganbaraido , "Masked Rider Battle: Ganbaride") is a combination of an arcade game and a collectible item game featuring the protagonists of the Kamen Rider Series.

Text: Kamen Rider Battle: Ganbaride:  Ever since "Kamen Rider Gaim"'s TV series airing until onwards, the game is now renamed to Kamen Rider Battle: Ganbarizing (仮面ライダーバトル ガンバライジング , Kamen Raidā Batoru Ganbaraizingu , "Masked Rider Battle: Ganbarizing") .
